items.name: Original Blend Coffee
items.description: Our signature Original Blend with the familiar and satisfying taste that Canadians enjoy every day.

items.name: Dark Roast Coffee
items.description: Our premium blend Dark Roast Coffee is carefully blended and roasted to give a rich, smooth, full flavour that millions enjoy.

items.name: Decaf Coffee
items.description: All the great taste of your Tim Hortons Coffee, without the caffeine.

items.name: Steeped Tea
items.description: Our unique Steeped process gently coaxes out the flavour of our loose-leaf Orange Pekoe tea, for a consistent, great tasting cup of Tea every time.

items.name: Specialty Tea
items.description: With so many Tim Hortons gourmet specialty teas to choose from, there's one for all your tea-savouring moments.

items.name: French Vanilla
items.description: Cozy up with our signature French Vanilla. Smooth, rich and delicious – it’s sure to warm your heart any time of the day.

items.name: Hot Chocolate
items.description: Warm, chocolaty deliciousness that’s sure to warm you up. Hot chocolate like it was meant to be.

items.name: Latte
items.description: Hand-crafted with freshly ground premium espresso beans and steamed 100% Canadian milk, our Lattes are simply delicious and perfectly uncomplicated.

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Just like a latte, but with more of our premium Espresso added for a fuller coffee flavour.

items.name: Americano
items.description: Classic

items.name: Pumpkin Spiced Latte
items.description: Limited Time Offer

items.name: Espresso Shot
items.description: A shot of espresso.

items.name: Cafe Mocha
items.description: Premium Tim Hortons coffee and delicious hot chocolate are blended together to make a truly irresistible café mocha.

items.name: Iced Capp
items.description: Our Iced Capp® blended frozen coffee beverage has a signature deep down, creamy cool taste that will satisfy your cravings.

items.name: Iced Coffee
items.description: The refreshing way to enjoy your favourite coffee. Sweet and creamy, we chill our premium blend coffee and serve it cold over ice.

items.name: Iced Latte
items.description: Enjoy premium Espresso blended with milk, sweetened and served over ice.

items.name: Creamy Chocolate Chill
items.description: A delicious combination of real cream and layers of chocolaty goodness. Experience a higher level of chocolaty.

items.name: Frozen Lemonade
items.description: Perfectly refreshing, this frozen drink blended with real lemon is sweetened and served icy cold.

items.name: Fruit Smoothie Strawberry Banana
items.description: A refreshingly cold beverage, blended with real fruit puree and our deliciously creamy Greek yogurt.

items.name: Milk
items.description: Available in 237ml & 473ml size.

items.name: Chocolate Milk
items.description: Available in 237ml & 473ml size.

items.name: Turkey Bacon Club Sandwich
items.description: Smoked turkey, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato and honey mustard sauce served on a home-style soft bun.

items.name: Ham & Cheddar Sandwich
items.description: Black Forest ham, Cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato and ranch dressing served on a homestyle soft bun.

items.name: BLT Sandwich
items.description: Crispy bacon strips, tomato, lettuce and mayonnaise served on a fresh baked homestyle soft bun.

items.name: Artisan-Style Grilled Cheese
items.description: Artisan sliced whole wheat bread, filled with processed Cheddar and topped with shredded Mozzarella and Monterey Jack cheese.

items.name: Chicken Bacon Ranch Grilled Wrap
items.description: Grilled seasoned chicken, savoury bacon, fresh tomato and lettuce, and ranch sauce.

items.name: Cold Cut Trio
items.description: Delicious meats, with tomato, lettuce, red onion, processed mozzarella cheese and garlic mayo on a fresh ciabatta bun.

items.name: Original Crispy Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Our Crispy Chicken Sandwiches are made with lightly breaded, seasoned white meat and prepared fresh to order.

items.name: Chicken Salad Sandwich
items.description: Seasoned chicken in mayonnaise dressing with onion and celery. Topped with lettuce and tomato, all on a croissant.

items.name: Steak & Cheese Panini
items.description: Seasoned steak, peppers & onions, cheddar cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato and chipotle sauce wrapped in a tortilla and grilled to perfection.

items.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
items.description: Diced all-white meat chicken, carrots, green peas, red peppers and hearty pasta are essentials when it comes to creating a wholesome chicken noodle soup.

items.name: Chili
items.description: Homestyle chili, the way it was intended. Ground beef, kidney beans, tomatoes and more simmered to perfection.

items.name: Potato Wedges
items.description: Deliciously seasoned, this perfect side is crispy on the outside with tender potato on the inside. Made with 100% Canadian potatoes.

items.name: Donut Multi Pack
items.description: Assorted variety of 6 donuts.

items.name: Timbit Multi Pack
items.description: Assorted variety of timbits.

items.name: Hash brown
items.description: Crispy, golden hash brown. Made with real, seasoned diced potato, cooked to golden brown crispy perfection
